details.title: Nonlinear filtering and time varying Schrodinger equation
details.abstract: Based on our previous work we have successfully reduced the nonlinear filtering problem for Yau filtering system to the time-varying Schrodinger equation. In order to solve the nonlinear filtering problem, one needs to solve the time-varying Schrodinger equation with an arbitrary initial condition. We then solve the time-varying Schrodinger equation by constructing the fundamental solution explicitly via a system of nonlinear ODES in case the potential is quadratic in state variables. This system of nonlinear ODES is solved explicitly by the power series method.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
